channel.title: HTTP on jdhao's digital space
channel.description: Recent content in HTTP on jdhao's digital space

item.title: How to Parse Query Param With Multiple Values in FastAPI
item.description: In HTTP request, same query parameter with multiple values are allowed. For example, for query parameter brand, the query string looks like this: brand=foo&brand=bar. How to parse value of this parameter to a list in FastAPI? There are several different ways.

item.title: Benchmarking Your HTTP Service Using wrk
item.description: As a machine learning engineer/data scientist, after the model development process is finished, we need to deploy the model as a web service using different web frameworks. To achieve maximum performance and lower the hardware cost, we often need to optimize the speed our service, including TensorRT acceleration, config tuning, etc.

item.title: Post Nested Data Structure to the Server Using Requests
item.description: In this post, I will share how to post complex data and decode it in the server side in Python.

item.title: 解决不蒜子 (busuanzi) 文章计数出错问题
item.description: 一个月之前，就发现自己的博客用的计数系统“不蒜子”对每篇博客访问量的统计出现了问题，刚写的博文，访问量都是几十万，显然不正常，但是很神奇，整个博客的访问量统计似乎并没有问题。当时也在 v2ex 发帖咨询了，不过没有人给出合理的答案，今天偶然间发现了原因，发文记录。

item.title: Downloading Images Faster with requests Sessions
item.description: In my previous post, I write about how to download an image from URL using requests. In this post, I want to share ways to make the download speed faster.

item.title: Build Web API with Flask --- Work with JSON-like Dict
item.description: This is a simple post about how to send JSON-like Dict data to a Flask server via requests package.

item.title: Build Web API with Flask -- Post and Receive Image
item.description: In this post, I want to write about how to build a simple image processing web API that returns the size of an image. The topics include how to build this web API with Flask and how to post image to this web API and get response.

item.title: Build A Web API Service Using Flask -- The Basics
item.description: Web API is a kind of web application. Simply put, web APIs are built for other applications to get info from the web server. For Python, Flask can be used to build web applications. In this post, I want to share how to build web APIs with Flask.
